metadata.name: Windows Processes Suspicious Parent Directory
metadata.comment: Detect suspicious parent processes of well-known Windows processes

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\svchost.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\taskhost.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\lsm.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\lsass.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\services.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\lsaiso.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\csrss.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\wininit.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\winlogon.exe'))) AND NOT ((endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\savservice.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\ngen.exe'))) AND (contains(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\system32\\')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\syswow64\\'))) OR (contains(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\windows defender\\')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\microsoft security client\\'))) AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\msmpeng.exe')) OR process.parent_process.name is null AND lower(process.parent_process.name) = lower('-')))

output.summary: Detect suspicious parent processes of well-known Windows processes

metadata.objective: False positive: Some security products seem to spawn these References: https://web.archive.org/web/20180718061628/https://securitybytes.io/blue-team-fundamentals-part-two-windows-processes-759fe15965e2, https://www.carbonblack.com/2014/06/10/screenshot-demo-hunt-evil-faster-than-ever-with-carbon-black/, https://www.13cubed.com/downloads/windows_process_genealogy_v2.pdf
